answers.answer: I'm 33 weeks and measuring at 35.5 weeks so I asked my Dr and she said they don't change the due date because sometimes they go through random growth spurts. .. so that's what could have happened to you
Sometimes they aren't accurate. At 16 weeks they said I was measuring at 18 weeks. Then at 18 they said he was 17 weeks 2 days (5 days smaller) so ...don't be too worried

Last time I went in (28 weeks) and was measuring at 31. I asked him and he was excited. He laughed and said we love big measurements! If you're measuring small is when we're concerned.  I go in next week and I'll be at 32 weeks and getting an ultrasound (last pregnancy I had issues with fluid) so he said we'll look than to see if she's big or just extra fluid ( :-) ) or what. :-)

I've been measuring big the whole time... Now at 37 weeks I'm measuring just over 40... The ultrasound showed baby boy to be at least a pound over the average... They are expecting a 9-10lb baby for me. Just means he is healthy as far as I'm told, no gd or anything

When u was 28 weeks dr. Said my fetal height was at 34 weeks & he didn't seem to worry. But then I went in for a ultrasound the same day and they weighed baby and checked his height and said he was right on track. So i don't know lol.  I'm a first timer so it's all new to me.If dr. Don't seem concerned I won't worry to much about it.

My last ultrasound (2 weeks ago) the tech told me i was measuring 2 weeks ahead (im 28 weeks measuring 30 weeks) had an appointment with my doc the same day and she wasnt too concerned just said she wanted to checkfor gestational diabetes again.

Shes checking me for the same for gd and i requested a ultrasound but he didnt seem concerned at all he didnt even tell me about it i herd the lady in the front say thats what it ment when i gave them my check out paper

question: Has this happened to anyone else. My doctor was not too concerned i have another ultrasound in 4 weeks along with the Gd test. Idk if i should freak out or if i can do anything different so my baby can be back on track where shes suppose to be. Ive had twins my first pregnacy and a 9 pound baby the last pregnacy if that makes a difference.
title: 24weeks 5days Measuring 28 weeks
